[\*\*\* Clifton City Council will hold a called meeting on Wednesday, January 28th, at 6PM in the Clifton Civic Center Council Chambers at 403 W 3rd Street. \*\*\* City offices will be closed on Monday, January 19th for Martin Luther King Jr. Day. \*\*\* Sanitation services changed on October 1st to a once weekly cart pick up and weekly bulk/brush pick up. You can find more information on the Public Notices page of our website. \*\*\*](https://cityofclifton.org/departments/city-administration#)
